title: Predicting Death - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/16/19
itunes:title: Predicting Death - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/16/19
description:
George Noory and Dr. Marilyn Singleton explore her research into medical algorithms, that doctors and medical insurance companies are using to predict when patients will die and maximize profits.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
